page.title: 04Employment
page.content: The three main industries in the area are Farming, Distilling and Baking. The numbers employed in farming have declined in recent years, but it still gives work to quite a few people. Distilleries have also been cutting down the number of people they employ. The biggest employer in the area is Walker's the bakery whose products go all round the world. Some people commute to Elgin and elsewhere to get jobs. There are quite a few tradesmen in Aberlour, electricians, joiners, plumbers, and builders, and they provide a lot of work for local people, serving a wide area around Aberlour. The schools, community centre garages, road haulage and shops also provide employment.
